document.full_text: russian security forces have killed an arab militant they say is al qaeda's top emissary to an islamist insurgency in russia's north caucasus region, russian news agencies said friday.
document.title: russia says kills al qaeda militant in north caucasus
lines_and_colors: russian security forces have killed an arab militant they say is al qaeda's top emissary to an islamist insurgency in russia's north caucasus region, russian news agencies said friday.
